projects.description: A program that displays a randomly selected quote at a set interval, or each time the user clicks a button.

a randomly chosen quote (Whatever you do, always give 100% - unless you're donating blood.) with a randomly chosen background color (purple)
a randomly chosen quote (Do or do not. There is no try.) with a randomly chosen background color (tan)

projects.description: A browser-based, word guessing game called 'Phrase Hunter'. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard.
image_urls: screenshot of the beginning of a game - a hidden phrase, alphabet of unsused keys and 5 lives remaining
screenshot of the middle of a game - a partially hidden phrase, alphabet of used and unused keys, 2 lives remaining
